articles.author: Taryn Ryder
articles.title: Kirsten Dunst says husband Jesse Plemons filmed chilling 'Civil War' scene as a favor: 'Nobody wants to play a role like that' - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: "Civil War" stars Kirsten Dunst, Wagner Moura, Cailee Spaeny talk about the new film, which depicts a dystopian near-future America.
articles.content: Kirsten Dunst is truly grateful that her husband Jesse Plemons stepped in to film a pivotal scene for Civil War, the new film in which she has the lead role, but that didn't make the two-day shoot pa… [+3584 chars]
